job_history.role_name: Intervention Specialist Teacher of Math and Language Arts
job_history.work_description: Identified students with substantial academic difficulties through evaluation using Developmental Reading Assessments and consultation with staff members of referred students. Developed differentiated lessons plans, and selected appropriate instructional materials to reach individualized student goals. Developed and implemented creative lessons with clear objectives linked to the common core that incorporated differentiated instruction.

Implemented positive behavior management using the color system. Developed clear objectives for students and parents for all lessons and activities. Designed differentiated common core lesson plans and activities to meet the needs of all learners.

Established and communicated clear objectives for all lessons, units and projects to both students and parents. Enhanced lessons using Smart Board technology and computers. Promoted language development skills through reading and storytelling.

skills.name: Classroom Management
skills.explanation: Developed and implemented positive behavior management systems, such as the color system, and established clear objectives for students and parents, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Lesson Planning
skills.explanation: Consistently developed differentiated lesson plans, selected appropriate instructional materials, and linked objectives to the common core, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Differentiated Instruction
skills.explanation: Designed and implemented lessons that incorporated differentiated instruction to meet the needs of all learners, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Established and communicated clear objectives for lessons, units, and projects to both students and parents, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Technology Integration
skills.explanation: Enhanced lessons using Smart Board technology and computers, indicating some practical experience with technology integration.

skills.name: Language Development
skills.explanation: Promoted language development skills through reading and storytelling, suggesting some practical experience with language development techniques.

skills.name: Assessment and Evaluation
skills.explanation: Identified students with substantial academic difficulties through evaluation using Developmental Reading Assessments, indicating some practical experience with assessment and evaluation techniques.
